hero.title: Draconic Translator for Fantasy Writing
hero.description: Discover VibeTrans, the best tool for seamless draconic translations. Effortlessly convert dragon lore into human language and unlock mystical insights. Experience user-friendly features and elevate your fantasy storytelling. Ready for magical communication?

tool.noInput: Please enter some text to translate.

whatIs.title: What is Draconic Translator?
whatIs.description: Draconic Translator is a specialized tool designed for fantasy writers and RPG players, enabling real-time translation of Draconic language. It supports text, image, and audio, providing accurate translations for immersive storytelling and gameplay.

examples.title: Draconic Language Translation Examples
examples.description: Discover authentic Draconic translations used in fantasy RPGs and D&D campaigns. These examples showcase how common English phrases transform into the ancient dragon tongue, featuring the distinctive Iokharic script patterns and base-12 numerical system inspired by dragon talons.

items.alt: Daily greeting translation showing Draconic salutation Svern for hello
items.name: Hello, how are you? → Svern, vur l'ir wux jacioniv?

items.alt: Business communication translation demonstrating formal Draconic meeting request
items.name: Schedule a meeting → Si mi vucot ekess ulhyrr wux vur tairais

items.alt: Emergency travel translation showing Draconic phrase for finding hospital
items.name: Where is the hospital? → Vur astahii jacioniv svabol yenta?

items.alt: Restaurant communication translation with polite Draconic menu request
items.name: Can I have the menu? → Re wux confn svern lyrik, coita?

items.alt: Formal gratitude translation showing Draconic thank you expression
items.name: Thank you for your help → Mobi ui svabol nomeno vur tairais

items.alt: Celebration translation demonstrating Draconic birthday greeting with well wishes
items.name: Happy birthday! → Bappir jacioniv! Si vucot wux zyak ekess confn ulhyrr

howto.title: How to Translate English to Draconic
howto.description: Follow these steps to translate English text to Draconic using our tool.

steps.name: Upload a File
steps.description: Begin by uploading your text file. Our tool supports multiple formats, ensuring a smooth translation process.

steps.name: Select Translation Mode
steps.description: Choose from various modes: technical, legal, or literary, ensuring your translation suits your needs.

steps.name: Review the Output
steps.description: Once translated, review the Draconic output. Ensure it meets your requirements and adjust settings if necessary.

steps.name: Download the Translation
steps.description: Download the translated document in your preferred format, ready for immediate use in your fantasy projects.

items.title: Dragons Count on Their Talons (Base-12!)
items.description: Did you know? Draconic, a language older than Elvish in the D&D multiverse, uses base-12 counting inspired by dragon talons. Explore linguistic magic with VibeTrans's draconic translation tools!

items.title: Iokharic Script: Written with Dragon Claws
items.description: VibeTrans reveals that Draconic, older than Elvish, uses a base-12 counting system inspired by dragons' talons. Its alphabet, Iokharic, mimics claw slashes, adding a fierce visual flair.

items.title: Draconic Dialects
items.description: Ever wondered if dragons have their own slang? VibeTrans dives into Draconic dialects, uncovering unique phrases that even the most seasoned adventurers might miss. From fiery expressions to mystical mutterings, discover the quirks and charms of dragon lingo. Perfect for adding flair to any mythical conversation!

items.title: Language Comparison
items.description: Ever wondered how languages stack up against each other? VibeTrans delves into linguistic quirks, from idioms to slang. Discover why French is the 'language of love' and how German compacts meanings. Uncover hidden gems and spice up your language game with VibeTrans.

items.title: Pronunciation Guide
items.description: Mastering pronunciation is like taming dragons—tricky but thrilling! VibeTrans brings phonetic finesse to your fingertips with a splash of fun. Ever stumbled over 'gnarly'? Fear not, this guide ensures you sound polished, not perplexed. Say goodbye to mispronunciations and hello to linguistic swagger!

items.title: Numerical Systems
items.description: Dive into the quirky world of numerical systems with VibeTrans. From binary to hexadecimal, numbers aren't just digits—they're a universal language. Ever wondered how computers 'talk'? Get the lowdown on how these numerical codes keep the digital world spinning. It's all in the numbers!

highlights.title: Draconic Translator Features
highlights.description: The best features for your translation needs

items.title: Lightning-Fast Dragon Tongue Translation
items.description: Experience instant bi-directional conversion between English and Draconic with automatic language detection, perfect for D&D campaigns and fantasy writing sessions.

items.title: Base-12 Numerical System Support
items.description: Accurately translates dragon mathematics using the authentic talon-inspired base-12 counting system unique to Draconic language and culture.

items.title: Iokharic Script Converter
items.description: Seamlessly transforms text between Latin alphabet and the ancient Iokharic script featuring claw-slash characters unique to dragon writing.

items.title: RPG-Ready Phrase Library
items.description: Access hundreds of situational phrases for combat threats, diplomatic exchanges, magical rituals, and dragon courtship—ideal for immersive roleplay.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Have other questions? Feel free to contact us via email.

item-1.question: What is Draconic Translator?
item-1.answer: Draconic Translator is an innovative tool that converts text into the fictional language of dragons, known as Draconic. It allows users to explore creative writing and bring fantasy worlds to life by providing accurate translations for role-playing games and storytelling.

item-2.question: Is this Draconic Translator free?
item-2.answer: The Draconic Translator is completely free to use. You can access all its features without any cost or subscription. Feel free to translate unlimited texts with no hidden fees or charges at any time.

item-3.question: How is my privacy protected?
item-3.answer: Your privacy is our top priority. We encrypt all data transmissions, store information securely, and never share your data with third parties. Regular audits ensure compliance with privacy standards. You can also control your data settings in your account preferences.

item-4.question: Which is the best Draconic Translator?
item-4.answer: The best Draconic Translator is one that combines accuracy with user-friendly features. Look for translators with a comprehensive vocabulary and intuitive interface. User reviews and expert recommendations can guide you to the most reliable options available.

item-5.question: Is there a Draconic Translator app?
item-5.answer: Currently, there is no official Draconic Translator app available. However, enthusiasts can find online tools and resources to assist with translations. Stay updated with the latest developments in app stores or online forums dedicated to fictional languages.

cta.title: Try VibeTrans Draconic Translator Now
